Brown Butter Ice Cream
70g butter
4 egg yolks
120g light brown sugar
20g raw sugar
1.5g salt
250ml whole milk
seeds of 1 vanilla pod
300ml double cream
  1. Brown the butter in a saucepan until medium brown, allow to cool a bit and beat into the eggs, sugar and salt
  2. Heat the milk with the vanilla and leave to infuse 30 minutes
  3. Make a custard with the milk and eggs
  4. Stir in the double cream
  5. Chill and churn
Notes
  • Adjusted cream and milk amounts from original recipe, which was 400ml cream and 150ml milk, as it was a bit too rich. Haven't tried with the adjustments yet
